column3:
harvest_of_year_op1:Distribue food amongst population
harvest_of_year_op2:Sell additional surplus

comet_sighted_op1:I'm sure this will have no consequences whatsoever!
comet_sighted_op2:Oh Ludd above, Moloch have risen! He comes!
comet_sighted_op3:Does that comet look like Antimatter to you?
comet_sighted_op4:This must be a carefully constructed ruse by Tri-Tachyon!
comet_sighted_op5:I really hope that was an inspection fleet burning up in our atmosphere
comet_sighted_op6:Quick, check if AI core is still there!
comet_sighted_op7:If we had comet sense...
comet_sighted_op8:So? It's just a comet...
comet_sighted_op9:Is that Sophia?
comet_sighted_op10:A warm thanks to many members of merchant's guild!
comet_sighted_op11:Fools it's the abyss ship from RAT!
comet_sighted_op12:I do not care who they send, I AM NOT PAYING TAXES!
comet_sighted_op13:Its a bird, its a plane, no... its megabreve!

accidental_finding_op1:Order team to unseal vault's gates.
accidental_finding_op2:Leave those doors and seal way to this vault.

vault_op1:Hack vault doors.
vault_op2:Use antimatter charges to destroy vault's door.
vault_op3:This vault might be dangerous, seal it!

accidental_finding_hacking_op1:Initiate local power surge with little amount of energy.
accidental_finding_hacking_op2:Initalize power surge through entire facility.

column2: Sands of Time - Structure Integrity Damaged

column3:
hh_op1:Welcome the Board Member to our colony! This is an opportunity too good to pass up
hh_op2:Politely Welcome them, but restrict their ability to invest in our industry to protect it from Tri-Tachyon influence
hh_op3:Decline the deal using some official statement of wanting to stay neutral in Tri-Tachyon affairs.

es_op1:Seal entrance to this crypt.
es_op2:Use this crypt to harvest organs.
es_op3:Awaken all people, that have been put into cryosleep.

qa_op1:Increase safetry measures in factories!
qa_op2:Ignore people's demands.

bd_op1:Sign the contract under your name
bd_op2:Shoot them and give the exact contract to the UAF 
bd_op3:Rip off the contract and publicly announce yourself as the inventor of those baked goods

nc_op1:From Ashes we rise.
nc_op2:We will create our own legacy.

bs_op1:Send small team to investigate this facility.
bs_op2:Fund huge expedition to those ruins and set up temporary facility.
bs_op3:Ignore those ruins.

bs_fac_op1: Explore Main Server Room 
bs_fac_op2: Explore Director's Office
bs_fac_op3: Explore Storage Area

arch_op1:We should dismantle this supercomputer.It served it's purpouse.
arch_op2:We will use it to help conducting our research.
